trigger.match: ^\".+?\" sings ([A-Z][a-z]+)(.+?)\, and (?:[hH]|[sS]h)e looks directly at you\.$
trigger.name: minstrelry_singing__

trigger.match: ^You stumble over your own feet as you try to dance\.$
trigger.name: minstrelry_stumbling__

trigger.match: ^Your mind reels as the stench of cactus weed overcomes you and takes you on a strange trip\.$
trigger.name: minstrelry_strangetrip__

trigger.match: ^As ([A-Z][a-z]+)\'s music washes over you\, your mind descends into chaos\.$
trigger.name: minstrelry_yaikoyaiko__

trigger.match: ^As the ringing note reverberates through your head dizzyingly\, you stumble\, hiccupping\, as your world blurs into a drunken haze\.$
trigger.name: minstrelry_shotnote__

trigger.match: ^A purple haze descends over your vision\, confusing you with wild hallucinations\.$
trigger.name: minstrelry_purplehaze__

trigger.match: ^The air around you shimmers in response to the song before igniting\, consuming you in a roaring pyre of red\-orange flame\.$
trigger.name: minstrelry_firefugue__

trigger.match: ^The rousing melody of the jamboree entices you to hum along gleefully\, all cares fleeing from thought\.$
trigger.name: minstrelry_jamboree__

trigger.match: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ begins bobbing [hH](?:is|er) head and then suddenly thrusts [hH](?:is|er) leg upwards\, catching you painfully in the gut\.$
trigger.name: minstrelry_cancan__

trigger.match: ^Laughing gaily in your drunken state\, you hop about wildly to the music\, shaking your rear and giving a loud belch\. Sobriety suddenly slaps you coldly in the face as you quickly descend from your high\, glancing around in mute embarrassment\.$
trigger.name: minstrelry_drunkenfool__
